com.appscend.mraid

Interface MadvertiseView.MadvertiseViewCallbackListener

  • Enclosing class:
    MadvertiseView

    public static interface MadvertiseView.MadvertiseViewCallbackListener
    Interface to receive diverse callbacks

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdClicked()
      Notifies the listener when an ad is clicked
      void onApplicationPause()
      Notifies the listener when a rich media ad is expanded so that the application can be paused.
      void onApplicationResume()
      Notifies the listener when a rich media ad is closed so that the application can resume.
      void onError(java.lang.Exception exception)
      Notifies the listener when exceptions are thrown
      void onIllegalHttpStatusCode(int statusCode, java.lang.String message)
      Notifies the listener when an illegal HTTP status code was received.
      void onLoaded(boolean succeed, MadvertiseView madView)
      Notifies the listener on success or failure

    • Method Detail

      • onLoaded

        void onLoaded(boolean succeed,
            MadvertiseView madView)
        Notifies the listener on success or failure
        Parameters:
        succeed - true, if an ad could be loaded, else false
        madView - specified view

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Notifies the listener when exceptions are thrown
        Parameters:
        exception - The thrown exception

      • onIllegalHttpStatusCode

        void onIllegalHttpStatusCode(int statusCode,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Notifies the listener when an illegal HTTP status code was received. This method is not called when the status code is okay (200)
        Parameters:
        statusCode - the HTTP status code
        message - a message with a reason of the problem

      • onAdClicked

        void onAdClicked()
        Notifies the listener when an ad is clicked

      • onApplicationPause

        void onApplicationPause()
        Notifies the listener when a rich media ad is expanded so that the application can be paused.

      • onApplicationResume

        void onApplicationResume()
        Notifies the listener when a rich media ad is closed so that the application can resume.
